import React from 'react' import './Loginpage.css' import Im31 from '../Images/shopping-bag.png'; const Loginpage = () => { return (

Welcome to M-cart

{submitted ? (

Profile Information

Name: {name}

Mobile: {mobile}

Email: {email}

{/* Note: Not displaying password for security reasons */}
) : ( <>

Please enter your details to log in

setName(e.target.value)} required /> setMobile(e.target.value)} required /> setEmail(e.target.value)} required /> setPassword(e.target.value)} required />
)}
) } export default Loginpage
